### Inter-region latency

| **Dallas** |   | 34 | 32 | 123 | 112 | 117 | 149 | 182 | 141 | 143 |
| **Toronto** |  34 |  | 19 | 92 | 82 | 107 | 170 | 212 | 162 | 128 |
| **Washington DC** |  31 | 19 |  | 94 | 75 | 89 | 175 | 215 | 167 | 119 |
| **Frankfurt** |  123 | 93 | 94 |  | 12 | 29 | 240 | 298 | 234 | 197 |
| **London** |  113 | 82 | 75 | 12 |  | 26 | 253 | 309 | 245 | 184 |
| **Madrid** |  119 | 108 | 88 | 29 | 26 |  | 265 | 323 | 259 | 203 |
| **Osaka** |  149 | 169 | 174 | 241 | 253 | 266 |  | 124 | 9 | 293 |
| **Sydney** |  185 | 215 | 214 | 297 | 309 | 323 | 124 |  | 116 | 328 |
| **Tokyo** |  142 | 162 | 168 | 234 | 246 | 258 | 9 | 118 |  | 285 |
| **Sao Paulo** |  145 | 129 | 120 | 194 | 184 | 206 | 292 | 328 | 284 |  |
